name: advance_profile
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_pro.
Tool description: Insatgram API Pro Version
API description: Retrieves an advanced profile from Instagram, optionally with email or phone if available.

ig.description: The Instagram handle of the user whose profile is to be retrieved.

response_type.description: Specifies the type of response desired.

corsenabled.description: Specifies if CORS is enabled. Default is 'false'.
